title: AI‑Assisted Dev Platforms That Actually Ship (And the Ones That Don’t)
summary: Reviewing Cursor, Windsurf, v0, 21st.dev, Copilot, and Claude Code—clear wins, painful misses, and honest recommendations.

body.raw:
## What shipped for me
- Cursor: refactor assistance on medium repos
- Claude Code: multi-file diffs, architecture planning
- Copilot: inline speed boosts in TS/React

## What didn’t
- Agents that “own” the terminal without tests
- Auto-generated CRUD without auth/validation
